channel.title: Modeling on Alfie Chadwick

item.title: Modeling Drug Use in Communities
item.description: Preface This was written as a University project but I’m pretty happy with how it turned out. Big thanks to Kevin Dai and Chrysovalantis Thomopoulos who worked with me on this throughout the semester. Introduction Drugs are chemical substances with physiological effects. Some drugs like opioids, cannabis, alcohol, nicotine, cocaine, methamphetamine, or heroin are of concern to policymakers. Widespread drug abuse in a community can be a burden to society and the economy.
